00056 ParametersDelegate::ParametersDelegate(  QObject* parent)
00057  : QItemDelegate(parent)
00058 {

00067 QWidget* ParametersDelegate::createEditor(QWidget *parent, const QStyleOptionViewItem& /*option*/, const QModelIndex &index) const
00068 {
00069         Trace trace( "ParametersDelegate::createEditor", false );
00070         
00071         const ParametersModel* model = static_cast< const ParametersModel* >( index.model() );
00072         SoField* field = model->ModelItem( index )->GetField();
00073         
00074         if( field->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( SoSFEnum::getClassTypeId() ) )
00075         {
00076                 QComboBox* editor = new QComboBox( parent );
00077                 SoSFEnum* enumField = static_cast< SoSFEnum* >( field );
00078                 for( int i = 0; i < enumField->getNumEnums() ; i++ )
00079                 {
00080                         SbName enumName;
00081                         enumField->getEnum( i , enumName );
00082                         editor->addItem( enumName.getString() );
00083                 }
00084                 return editor;
00085         }
00086         else
00087         {
00088                 QLineEdit* editor = new QLineEdit(parent);
00089                 return editor;
00090         }
00091 }
00092 
00093 void ParametersDelegate::setEditorData(QWidget *editor,
00094                                      const QModelIndex &index) const
00095 {
00096         const ParametersModel* model = static_cast< const ParametersModel* >( index.model() );
00097         SoField* field = model->ModelItem( index )->GetField();
00098         
00099         if( field->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( SoSFEnum::getClassTypeId() ) )
00100         {
00101 ;
00102                 SoSFEnum* enumField = static_cast< SoSFEnum* >( field );
00103                 int selectedIndex = enumField->getValue();
00104                 
00105                 QComboBox* combo = static_cast<QComboBox *>(editor);
00106                 combo->setCurrentIndex( selectedIndex );
00107 
00108         }
00109         else
00110         {
00111                 QString value = index.model()->data(index, Qt::DisplayRole).toString();
00112                         
00113                 QLineEdit  *textEdit = static_cast<QLineEdit *>(editor);
00114                 textEdit->setText(value);
00115         }
00116 
00117         
00118 }
